1.content: First, what is your gender?
1.title: Boy or girl

11.content: Now what kind of deck do you run?
11.title: Your deck?

111.content:
"Sorry, but Spirit reaper is unable to be destroyed as a result of battle... So, is it my turn?" Joey sighed, "Yeah... I guess..."

I grinned. "Ok, for my turn, I'll play snatch steal to gain control of your red eyes... Then I activate Final Ritual of the Ancients. This allows me to sacrafice red eyes, and the Kuriboh in my hand to summon Reshef the dark being,"

Reshef: 2500 atk

"Next, I discard a spell from my hand to activate Reshef's effect, and gain control of your alligator sword. I'll sacrafice him for Skull Archfiend of lightning,"

Skull Archfeind: 2500 atk

"I'll switch spirit reaper to attack mode..."

Reaper: 300 atk

"Then I'll use my face down card, call of the haunted, to summon my Terrorking Archfiend from the grave,"

Terrorking: 2000 atk

"Now..." I chuckled evily, "Everything attack directly... for a total of..." I did a bit of counting on my fingers, "... A grand total of 7300!" Joey was silent for a moment. "Erm... I only had 1500 left... dontcha think dat was a bit much?"
I scratched my head, then smiled, "Sorry... got carried away... Well, good game!" Joey grinned. "Yeah... Almost had ya near the end! That reapa thing saved ya," Joey gave me a thumbs up, and coming from someone who could almost compare with Yugi Motou, that ment alot.
"Hay, let me see your cards," Tea Garner said. She'd been watching mine and Joey's lunch time duel. Before I could even reply, she was leaning over the table, and putting some "parts" right in my line of sight. She stayed there, leaning over the table like that, and I began getting red in the face.
I'd only been at Domino High a couple of days, and I've already have been having some dirty thoughts about Miss Garnder... Ofcourse, what teenage boy at this school hasn't?! I mean, geeze! It's just part of being a guy... Science proves that most men think of sex atleast five times a minute... I'm not a pervert or anything... If I was, I'd probably pretend to reach over to shake Wheeler's hand, and then "accidently" brush up against her chest, but I ain't that kind of guy...
"Well... Lunch is almost ova, an I gotta geo test today..." Joey stood up and gathered his deck, then gave me a friendly wave, and left. Tea finished reading Reshef's effect, and stood up straight. She giggled a bit, and it might have been at the slight nose bleed that I'd just aquired. "See you at lunch tomarrow," She waved, and followed Joey out of the cafeteria. I just put my hand to my cheek, and waited for the color to go back to normal.
111.title: Archfiend

1111.content:
Later that night, I had a dream... In that dream, I was an egyptian Pharoh, and Tea was a belly dancer. You know, the girls that dress in the bikinis with the see-through silk skirts, and sway their hips back and forth... Hay! Don't judge me! What have YOU thought about her? Huh?! I bet its ten times worse then Tea as a belly dancer... I wonder if I can convince her to go as a belly dancer next holloween...
Gah! What am I talking about... I barely know her, and she seems to have a thing for that Yugi kid... I talked to him once at lunch, but we don't have any classes together. Also, yesterday he stayed home sick or somthing. Oh, well I guess its about time I introduced myself. My name is John. I'm part of a student exchange program that put me here for atleast a month or two. I'm living at the Taylor's house in a sleeping bag on the floor of Tristan's room. Lotta clutter here... Reminds me of home.
Sometimes, I get to IM my friends from back home, and chat about the goings ons of here and home... Thats kinda what I was doing when I woke up from that dream...

Machineknight48076: *feels left out* :(

I logged off, and turned around. Tristan was standing right behind me, and was snickering. "You read that all, didn't you..." I spoke in monotone, and kinda already knew the answer... "Yeah, and its kinda funny... You like Tea?"
"No, I just fantasized about her dressed as a Belly dancer..."
"Well your a bit late... I think she already likes Yugi,"
"Well shes still hot..." I mummbled.
"Heh... I'm gunna tell her you said that!"
"No! Hay! Dude! C'mon! That ain't cosher!"
Tristan jumped into his bed. "Well, get some sleep lover boy!" he made some sick smooching sounds, and I chucked my shoe at his head. We were already fighting like siblings, and I'd only been there three days... If you don't count saturday...
As soon as I heard Tristan's snoring rev up like a chain saw, I slid into my lil' blue sleeping bag. I then started talking to myself in my head...
'I might have a shot with her... I'm 6'3, can lift 236 pounds... gotta fairly nice tan...'
'Heh... not a chance... Got a honking monobrow... I weigh 237... she's really cute... can't compete with the king of games...'
'WAIT! Thats it! Maybe if I can beat Yugi in a duel, Tea will fall for me!'
My rational thought and the optomist within me now agreed on somthing. 'Yes! There's a tournament next saturday... Maybe if I beat Yugi, then I can get a date from Tea...'
I kept on scheming till my brain wouldn't let me think, and put me to sleep...
1111.title: MSN Messenger

11111.content:
Lesse...
Went to english
went to geometry
then I skipped biology... screw grades...
Now it was lunch time...

"So Yugi's still out with the flu?" I asked Joey with a mouthfull of sloppy joe. "Yeah... Musta hit him hard, cauze I called him up, an he sounded all weak an frail..."
"Poor Yugi," Tea sighed, and stared up at the ceiling. "So, on a seperate and totally unrelated note... Are you entering that tournament saturday?" I really didn't care... I just wanted to know what I was up against. "Yeah, me an Yug both! Why John? You goin' too?" I smiled and nodded a yes. "Well, I'm gunna work on my deck so I can actually beat Yug this time,"
"Of course, you'll have to get past me first," I said proudly, and according to the look on his face, I had brought up a memory of his crushing defeat at my hands yesterday. He nodded, and shrugged at the same time, "I'm sure dat win yesterday was dumb luck..."
"More like dumb skill," I added, trying to sound slick.
Joey stood up, and disposed of his empty lunch tray. Almost everyone had left already, and classes were going to start any minute... "See ya guys!" Joey left, and I gave a quick good bye wave. "Well, I should get going too..." Tea had finally peeled her eyes away from the ceiling, and her thoughts off of Yugi. As she started walking away, I stood up suddenly, and blurted out: "W-wait a moment,"
She looked back at me over her shoulder, and said "yes?" I could tell my face was red... My arm was gittering, and I probably looked like I'd puke blood. I didn't know what to say... so I did what I do when reading a presentaion to the class: I wing it.
"Ummm... I heard that there was an arcade in town... I was... Ummm... wondering..." I scratched the back of my head, and tried to get at my brain with my fingers so it'd think faster. "You see, I don't know my way around here, and I was wondering if you'd show me around," My voice cracked towords the end, and I felt like such a loser for even speaking to her in the first place.
She gave me an "Aww... thats so cute!" smile that people give you when they can tell you like them. She winked and said; "Its a date"

I stood there frozen for a long period of time after she left... I blew off gym class too.

***

Machineknight48076: Dude, you got a date with her?!
Snap: No... I lied... She's just going to show me around town...
Machineknight48076: Oh... well... HA... I don't care. So g2g! But before I do, I'm just gunna let you know that I'm coming to Domino high next week... I'm getting relocated for tossing some stuff out the window... They really get mad when you hit the principal's car with a chair...

I chuckled as I logged off. I knew he was lieing, and was probobly becoming an exchange student also...

Well, I got into my sleeping bag, threw in a pair of ear plugs to drown out Tristan's snoring, and fell asleep...
11111.title: Its a date!

111111.content:
Lunch came the next day, and with it, another chance to see Tea.

"So," asked Joey. "You guys wanna do somethin' afta' school?" For a moment, I felt my heart leap into my mouth. "Actually," Tea replied. "I'm going to show John around this afternoon." "Is dat so?" asked Joey, giving me a look that said 'You bad boy.' "Oh, cut it out Joey!" said Tea, playfully bonking him on the head.
"Hey!" said Joey, rubbing the top of his head. "Dat hurt!" he said, feigning pain. "Then stop picking on poor John," said Tea. "Oh fine," said Joey, giggling slightly. The lunch bell rang, and we headed out.

After school, Tea and I went into Domino. "Don't blow it." I thought, "This is your only chance to make a good first impression, so don't blow it." We came to the Arcade, and there stood the owner, President, and CEO of Kaiba Corp., Seto Kaiba.

"Well, if it isn't one of the 'Nerd Herd'. Where's the rest, and what's this, someone new decides to join?"

"C'mon, let's go," said Tea to me. "No, it's alright,"
I said. In retrospect, what I did was probably foolish,
but I was a man on a mission.

"Is it really?" asked Kaiba smugly.

"Yes," I said with a newfound confidence. "Kaiba, I challenge you to a duel!" "Uh, John, this isn't necessary," said Tea. "Actually," I said. "With you cheering me, win or lose, to me, I'll be a winner. "How sweet," mocked Kaiba. "I would almost shed tears, if I had any tears to shed, that is," "Enough talk," I said, activating my duel disk. "Let's duel!" Kaiba then did the same.

John LP: 4000
Kaiba LP:4000

"I'll go first, if you don't mind," I said, drawing a card. "I activate the spell card, Terraforming, to place one field spell card into my hand, and I choose Pandemonium. Next, I'll activate Pandemonium. Then, I'll summon the Pandemonium Watchbear in defense mode.
Next, I'll activate the ritual spell card, Contract with the Abyss, to summon any dark-type monster in my hand to the field, as long as I tribute a monster with as many stars as that monster or more. And I choose the Summon Skull to summon Terrorking Archfiend in attack mode. Finally, I'll place one card face-down and end my turn.

"Finally," said Kaiba. "I thought that would never end." "I activate the the Fiend-Sancuary spell card, which places one Metal Fiend token on the field. Then I activate the Cost-Down spell card. Finally, I tribute my Metal Fiend token to summon my Blue Eyes White Dragon. And now my dragon, attack his Terrorking with White Lightning." "I counter with Wobaku," I said. "This trap reduces all battle damage to zero for the duration of the turn." "Fine," said Kaiba. "I'll place one card face-down, and end my turn."

"My draw," I said. "I activate Card of Sanctity, which makes it so we both have to draw till we have six cards in our hands. Then, I activate Pot of Greed, to draw two more cards. Next, I summon Infernalqueen Archfiend in attack mode. Then, I activate Hammershot, to destroy the monster with the highest ATK on the field, so now your dragon is no more. Next, I activate Mystical Space Typhoon to destroy your face-down card. Then, I activate my Queen's special ability, to increase the power of one Archfiend on the field by one thousand, and I choose itself. Then, I'll switch my Watchbear into attack-mode, and they'll all attack you for," I did some quick addition in my head,
"4200 LP damage."

The resulting attacks were enough to bring Kaiba to his knees. Slowly, grunting with the effort, he got back to his feet. "Hrrgh, this is impossible," he said through gritted teeth. "How could an amateur like you take me down?!"

Tea then ran over and gave me a big hug, which I'd have to say was about the happiest moment in all my 17-year old life. "I don't believe, I don't BELIEVE it!" she said ecstatically. "You actually won, I don't BELIEVE it!" I happily accepted her hug, placing my hands on her shoulders. I figured anything lower than the small of her back would have ruined everything, besides the moment I mean, and I didn't want to tempt myself.

We walked to her home together, hand in hand, talking about my victory. When we got to her home, it was starting to get dark. She smiled at me and said,
"Goodnight John, I'll see you tomorrow at school," lightly kissing me on the cheek. She then went in. On the way home that evening, there was a definite spring to my step. I felt lighter than air, like all my troubles were over.

Had I seen the shadowy figure in the next alley over as I entered Tristan's house, however, I would have said that my real troubles were just beginning.
111111.title: Blue-Eyes-White-Duel

1111111.content:
Whoever that shady figure was... I KNEW I had a bad feeling about him. No matter. I'll worry about that tomorrow! Right now, I'm getting some nice quiet sleep...

*SSSSNNOOOORRREEEEEE!!!....eeuuuooo....*

Geez, Tristan SHUT UP!!!

--The Next Day--

*CCRRRAASSHHH!!!*

What the??!! A loud crashing noise woke me up from sleep! What happened?!

I rushed out of Tristan's bedroom and headed for the living room.... someone's been here! And someone's tore apart the house! Aw no... Tristan!!! He was out cold.

I went to his aid. He was alive, but unconscious! I turned my head.. and saw an eerie figure in a black cloak head out the door!

I gave chase to this mysterious man..

He was fast, but I was gaining on him! He kept turning through alleys and I still trailed along with him!!

Finally I trailed him to a little dead end! With nowhere else to go, he simply turned facing me!
"Allright! WHO ARE YOU???!!" I shouted to him.

That's when he took off that hood.... this man.. had strange red and black spikey hair with yellow streaks... with such a childish face that could make any mother go "AAWWWWW.." ...wait a minute...! This man...was YUGI??!!!

Something was strange about him... his eyes were glowing red and I felt such a darkish aura flowing through him... his milennium puzzle was glowing a strange color... what's gotten into Yugi (so to speak)?!!

He just smile such a childish grin and raised his hand, "Hi John!"
1111111.title: Yu-Gi-NOOOOOOOOO!!!!

choices: Wait for him to do something first

You gulp, Yugi's the best. No denying that. But you have fath in your fiend-deck.
Fiends are classified into two different dimensions: The Archfiend Dimension and the Necrofear Dimension. You have both.

111111111.title: deck review

1111111111.content:
"I'll go first, by playing Pandemonium and these four face-downs." I said, playing my three Hellpoemers in face-down defense-mode with my Coffen Seller.

Yugi smild and my brain turned to sluge, Yugi smilling at the one he was dueling? Bad omin 101 in duel monsters.

"I'll summon my Archfiend of Gillfer and attack!"

I winced, I was milking it of course, but I didn't want HIM to know that! Yugi giggled like a demented thee-year-old as my monster was destroyed.

"Turn end."

"Back to me then. I activate Card of Sanctity, which makes it so we both have to draw till we have six cards in our hands. Then, I activate Pot of Greed, to draw two more cards. Next, I summonI'll summon Newdoria in attack-mode." I said "Turn end."

"My move." Yugi said "I summon Gazelle the king of mythical beasts and attack your face-down, then I'll attack you final defense-mode monster!" as my last two Hellpoemers were sent to the graveyard, I used the cards in my hand to hide my simle, see, I knew Yugi knew about Newdoria's effect, but at the same time I knew something was wrong, Yugi didn't duel this way!

"Turn end."

I drew a card. "My move, but look at your graveyard." I said, Yugi looked and gasped as he saw my three Hellpoemers in his graveyard. "Now I'll acctivate Coffen Seller! for every card that is discarded from your hand, you take 700 points of damage and with my three Hellpomer's effect of randome discard on every turn, you'll take 2100 points!" I said "Now I'll switch Newdoria to defense-mode and give you a gift, my Lava Golem! by sarificing your two monsters, and now I'll play one face-down, D.N.A Surgery and choose fiend-type, then I'll play the card I entered into that Idustrual Illusions card-making-contest and end my turn!"

Yugi attacked Newdoria and to my dismay, I had to use it's effect to kill Lava Golem. Yugi then played two face downs and summoned Alph the Magnet warrior then ended his turn.

"I'll activate my Fiend’s double-cross and take control all Fiend-type monsters, even yours, sure it costs me to pay 3000 life points to activeat this trap card, but Fiends arn't known for being saints, Now I'll attack with Alph the Magnet Fiend!" Yugi took 1400 damage and his Life points were vanishing. "Finally, I'll play Mostser reborn and attack with the Archfiend of Gillfer!"

Yugi's Life point hit zero
1111111111.title: The duel starts

11111111111.content:
Yugi's milennium puzzle shot a yellow-green beam of energy at me and I braced myself. Just as the beam was about to hit, a pure black bolt of energy shot from my deck and the yellow-green beam started...screaming?

"So...YOU are the one that I must kill!!!!!" Ok, the energy was talking to me. This was crazy.

"I am the energy-being Ganizorous." the beam said "I feed off the energy that duelests put into their decks! Only one person has ever stopped me: The Fiend-Tammer! Once I gather enough Fighting spirit power, I will construct myself an all-powerful body!"

"What dose this have to do with me? Why did you attack my friends? Why did you posses Yugi?" I asked, Ganizorous cackled "We well meet again my old foe, I must kill you or history will repeat itself with our last battle 3000 years ago."

"What?!"

Ganizorous vanished after than.
11111111111.title: Freaky  meeting

111111111111.content:
Yugi greeted me waith a hello at school, I waved back and pulled him aside. He'd been out like a light all night, and right now he looked like he'd been on the short end of the stick with a bull that had too much coffie. I had told him about what happened with that wird energy-being Ganizorous, he found it beleivable.

"You still ok?" I asked

"Worn out, but other than that I am. I asked grampa about Ganizorous and The Fiend-Tammer, nothing."

Ever since my duel with Ganizorous-Yugi, it was all I could think of, it refused to leave me alone. Yugi had promised to look into it to help me, his luck was as good as mine.

"Hey guys! Its time for class!" Tea called, just hearing her voice made me turn red. Yugi snickered, and found himself with his deck being fore-fead to him.

Just as I was heading into class, A duelest stopped me. Apparently, news a Fiend-themed duelest beating Kiba got around quickly, and I was the only one in school with a fiend-deck

It was...
111111111111.title: More duels

1111111111111.content:
"Hey! you the guy I heard of?" Rex Raptor called to me

"Hm?"

"The Fiend-user that beat Kiba!"

"Yeah. So what? that guy's a has-been." I said

"Heh. Kiba a has-been? I like the way you think. I'm here to duel you." Rex said

"I can't right now. Class." I said

"Wuss!"

At least my dueling skills aren't as out-dated as fossilized dino turd." I snickered as I took my Fiend Sanctuary card and put in my deck

"Why you....!"

"How about this: I'll give you a raincheck, duel me AFTER school gets out."

"Deal, My dinos will make you extinct."

"Yeah, extinct with BORDOME!" I laugh
1111111111111.title: Rex

11111111111111.content:
"I start by Summoning Ritual Raven next I'll play Final Ritual of the Ancients. This allows me to sacrafice Ritual Raven and summon Reshef the dark being, next I’l paly monster reborn and bring back Ritual Raven then use Contract with the Dark Master to summon Dark Master - Zorc "

"Huh? how'd you do that?"


"Ritual Raven's effect let him be the only sarifical tribute needed for a Ritual card to work." Now I'll attack!"

Rex's Life points dropped to zero.

"I win."

Now to celabrate, I'll ask Tea out. I thought.
11111111111111.title: an easy  duel

choices: You duel Kisara and she's got a Blue-eyes white dragon-themed deck
111111111111111.content:
I was enjoying my time with Tea, very much so.

Suddenly a person came up to me. It was a girl, possibly about the same age as me or Kiba. Taking her appearance in at a glance, I noted that almost everything about her was white, or near enough. The sky-blue coat she wore, lined with white fluff, covered whatever shirt she was wearing underneath and wrapped around her slim form. A long white skirt flowed out from under the coat and ended just above her feet, over which were navy, soft, malleable shoes. Pale hair, colored like sun-bleached sand, fell to her waist. Her skin, as he saw from part of her face and her fingers, appeared to be completely white (which of course was impossible - she probably had some kind of skin disease). The only part which I was unable to see, as she had not brushed back all of her hair, were her eyes.


"You...you'll pay for what you did!"

Why was she so mad at me?

"Um...what for?"

"First you defeat Lord Seto, then you mock him! I'll see you defeated Fiend-tamer!"

" 'Lord Seto' ? You acctually like that guy?!?!? Wait...did you just call me the Fiend-tamer?!?!?! Who are you?!"

"My name is Kisara. Now, in the name of lord Seto I'll crush you with all the power of my soul!"

1111111111111111211.title: Create A Card

choices: Kaiba sees the BEWD and wants it
112.content:
"Sorry, Joey. But destroying my Reflect Bounder does the damage to you instead," you say, making your friend groan.

"AHHHHH! I lose again! First to Yugi, then to you!" groaned Joey, making your friends, Yugi, Tea, and Tristan all chuckle at his immature behavior.

"Ah come on, Joey. You did pretty fine," you say, putting a hand on the former bully's shoulder.

Yugi then nodded, "(Insert your name here) just has more experience and better cards than you. We get our good cards from my grandpa's game shop,"

Joey then stood up, "Your own game shop?!! COOL!!!"
**************************************************
Later...

"Wow! Look at all these cards!" shouted Tristan.

Yugi's grandpa smiled, and said, "You kids wanna see a really rare and powerful card?"

"Sure!" the four of you shout in unison. Yugi's grandpa then took out an old wooden box and unlocked the seal. Inside was a card of a huge and powerful-looking white dragon.

"Behold! The Blue Eyes White Dragon!" shouted Yugi's grandpa, proud.

You pick up the card and say, "Wow! I heard of this..." before Yugi's grandpa snatches it out of your hand.

"This card is very important to me! A dear friend of mine gave this to me!" shouted Yugi's grandpa. You apologize and then began looking over cards that could add some power to your deck. It was then a figure walked in, holding a briefcase. You look and gulp, for it was the last person you wanted nearby: Seto Kaiba, the spoiled rich brat of Domino High...
112.title: The Blue Eyes White Dragon

choices: To stay and cheer your little buddy on!
that you should help get Grandpa Mutoh to the hospital
1121.content:
"Hey Kaiba...don't you have some big fancy company to run?" you snarl at Kaiba. The rich brat just shoves you aside, about to say something to Yugi's grandpa. His eyes then lay upon the BEWD card in the box, and he gasps.

"The Blue Eyes White Dragon?!! Here?!! In this junk shop?!!!" shouted Kaiba. He slams his briefcase onto the counter and opens it. Inside is a whole case of rare and powerful cards. "Listen old man, I'll trade all these cards for that one,"

"Sorry, but no deal," said Yugi's grandpa.

"Then is it money you want? I can pay you anything!" shouted Kaiba.

"Yes, but that card was given to me by a good freind of mine. I can feel his heart within this card," said Yugi's grandpa.

Kaiba stomps out of the room, grumbling, "Heart inside a card...ridicolous..."
**************************************************
Later, you, Yugi, Joey, Tea, and Tristan are at the ice cream palor and talking, when a man in a black suit appeared.

"Yugi Mutoh...you best come with me. Your grandpa is in big trouble..." smirked the man. Yugi gasps, and you growl, knowing that rat Kaiba is up to something. You all rush to Kaiba's company, coming just in time to see Yugi's grandpa staggering out of a room.

"I'm...sorry, Yugi..." gasped Yugi's grandpa, falling onto the ground.

"Grandpa!!!" shouted Yugi, running to his grandpa's side.

Kaiba comes walking out, smirking, "Your grandpa and I had a little duel, betting our rarest cards...and I won," He holds up the BEWD card, and to everyone's shock, he tears it up!

"My card...my treasure..." gasped Yugi's grandpa, the stress too much for him. He weakly reaches for his deck and gives it to Yugi, urging him to beat Kaiba.

"YU-GI-OH!!!!" shouted Yugi, his Millinuem Puzzle glowing, and it appeared he has some expressional changes. Tea then took a marker and marked yours, Yugi's, and all the rest of your friends' hands.

"This is a symbol of freindship," said Tea, before she and Tristan helped Yugi's grandpa to the hospital. You decide...
1121.title: Friendship

choices: Kaiba goes off, silent and defeated
11211.content:
"Come on, Yugi! You can beat him!" you shout to your little buddy.

"I shall start this duel off," smirked Kaiba, as they drew their hands. "And I shall start with...the Hitotsume Giant!"

"HUH?!!!!!!" you shout to see Kaiba's monster come to life. Kaiba then explains about the holographic technology and how he used it to beat Yugi's grandpa. You watch as Yugi and Kaiba duel, and your friend is starting to win when...

"I play the Blue Eyes White Dragon!" shouted Kaiba, before the famed dragon appear. "Yugi, your grandfather only had one of the four BEWD cards!"

"Uh-oh..." you think with a gulp.

"WHITE LIGHTNING!!!" shouted Kaiba, before his dragon vapped Yugi's Gaia the Fierce Knight. You watch in horror as Yugi tries in vain to protect himself, but soon your fears grow for Kaiba plays another Blue Eyes. "HA! HA! If you think two is bad enough, why not try three?!!"

"So that's why he ripped up Mr. Mutoh's card. It was so he would have the only three in existence," you think to yourself.

When all three of his BEWD were poised to attack, Kaiba smirks, "Draw your last pathethic card so I can end this..."

"My grandpa's deck has no pathethic Kaiba...but it does have the unstoppable Exodia!" Yugi smirks.

"AHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!! IMPOSSIBLE!!!" shouted Kaiba, as Yugi's most unstoppable beast appeared.

"EXODIA!!! OBILERATE!!!" shouted Yugi, before Exodia blasted all three of Kaiba's BEWD and the rest of his LPs.
11211.title: Exodia the Forbidden One

choices: You find out Yugi's grandpa lost his soul to Pegasus!
You and Yugi plan to enter the tournament to save Grandpa Mutoh
112111.content:
Soon, you hear Yugi's grandpa made a full recovery, and all was well. However, little did you or your friends know...it was just the beginning.

One day, you were walking home and found a package at your door. You look at the tag and see its marked for you.

"What could this be?" you think, taking the box inside. When you open it, you find a glove and two star chips inside with a tape. You watch the tape, and it tells you that you are one of the selected few to participate in the Duelist Kingdom tournament. You run to Yugi's card shop to tell him, but you find he's got the same package. You, Tea, Tristan, Grandpa Mutoh, and Joey watch the tape with Yugi.

"Greetings Yugi. I am Maxillimillion Pegasus," said the man with the long white hair covering part of his face.

"Hey, that's the guy who made Duel Monsters," you say.

Pegasus then said, "Congradulations on beating Seto Kaiba. I'm inviting you to my Duelist Kingdom tournament...but first I like to test your skills," Before anyone could say anything, you black out when Pegasus moves away his hair to reveal his golden fake eye...

When you wake up, you find Grandpa Mutoh unconcious on the ground, and Yugi shouting, "Grandpa! Grandpa!"
112111.title: The Creator of Duel Monsters

1121111.content:
You see Yugi lying next to his Grandpa, shaking him. "What happened?" You say as you walked over to Yugi. Joey, Tea, and Tristan had just woken up too.
Yugi looks at you, sobbing madly. "It was P-Pegasus! We dueled, but he won and took Grandpa's soul! We have to enter in his tournament to get it back!"
You stare in shock and doubt at Yugi's words. "I don't know, Yugi. Pegasus sounds dangerous!"
Joey glares at you. "How can you say that? If Yugi is right, there is no other way to get his grandfather's soul back? Are you going to chicken out?"
Everyone looks at you intensely as they wait for your answer...
1121111.title: Decision Time!

choices: A blonde girl with a bad attitude
Two duelists: One has short green hair and big yellow glasses, and the other has
11211111.content:
"Let's do it, Yugi! I'll help you get your grandpa's soul back!" you shout.

"And I will too!" shouted Joey.

"Uh, did you get a package too, Joey?" asked Tristan.

Joey then gulped and went, "Uh..."

"In other words, no," you say. After making some preparations, you and Yugi head for the boat that will leave for Duelist Kingdom. However, you soon meet...
11211111.title: Off to Duelist Kingdom

choices: You wait in silence as Yugi and the others join you.
You're approached by one of the guards and asked about your star chips.
112111112.content:
As your group approaches the ship taking duelists to Duelist Kingdom, you spot two duelists off to the side, talking to eachother.

"That's Weevil Underwood!" Yugi exclaims. "And next to him is Rex Raptor. Those two are great duelists. Looks like the competition's going to be tough."

"Yeah, but you just wiped the floor with Seto Kaiba, Yug," Joey says. "That punk's itty bitty bugs and the other's jurassic losers don't stand a chance against us!"

"Just one thing, Joey," you chime in, "Yugi actually has star chips and a dueling glove to back up his statements."

"Yeah," Tristan says, "You on the other hand, Joey..."

"Alright, shut up you two! I'll show them and their precious star chips that Joey Wheeler is the man!"

Suddenly, you hear Weevil's obnoxious voice call towards you and your friends.

"It can't be! Yugi Muto! Is it true that you really beat Seto Kaiba with Exodia? Wow, its no wonder you were invited to this tournament," Weevil says.

You shake your head and walk up to the deck of the ship where you wait for Yugi and the others.
112111112.title: Weevil and Rex

"Oh, this is Mai Valentine, a childhood friend of mine." You said. "Cool, but what's her real name?" Joey asked. "THAT IS MY REAL NAME AMATEUR!" Mai yelled. "Hey, Mai. Calm down. These guys are my friends." You said. "Fine. Hey, do you wanna have a duel?" Mai asked. "Yeah Sure. Still rolling with your Harpie Lady Deck?" You said. "Yeah, you still rolling with your Ground Deck?" Mai asked. "No, I switched to the Cyber Type." You said.

You and Mai pulled out the Kaiba Corp. Duel Disks, and powered them up. "I will go first. I play Harpie Lady." Mai said. Harpie Lady appeared in front of her. "I play Cyber Thousand Dragon!" You said.

"My turn, said Joey, "I summon baby dragon in Attack mode". "We'll it look cute already", said Mai, "my turn and I use a spell card that triples my harpies, they each now have each a total of 2800 each", said Mai, "But I can't attack so your turn". Joey drew his next card, "I summon time wizard", said Joey. "What on earth is that thing", asked Mai. "It makes time go faster evolving certain monsters into bigger monsters", said Joey. "Time wizard", the monster said. "Baby dragon, evolves into thousand dragon". "So you've got a bigger dragon, big deal", said Mai. "You sure, because look down on the Field. "What my Harpie ladies, they're so old and their attack has dropped to 1300 points each", said Mai looking freaked out. Mai turned her head around. "Remember me, Rex Raptor the Dino duelist, and since we arrived I've been itching to duel you". "That's funny, I thought I took care of you last time", said Mai. "What, you happen to know I already have 5 star chips". Mai show him her glove. "What, how did you get 8 star chips?". "From want-a-be's like you they think by duelling a chick they will get easy star chips, I've only loss once but when I find that punk kid Joey it's payback time", said Mai. "Joey Wheeler?, how could you lose to him?", asked Rex. "I would like to see you try to…, alright i'll duel you if you do something for me". Meanwhile. choices: duel with a kid for respect
11212.content:
Mike decided not to cheer Yugi on at his duel. it was completely pointless. and, while he was at it, he sneaked away from the rest of the group, dissapearing into the shadows. "i hate to ditch them, but i got my own problems right now that goes above a card game." mike said with a sigh.


as he rode the bus to his town, his duel ID flashed in the window. number 0007 gleamed as any dark non reflective ink would if hit by light. he reached his house; a small townhouse in the back alleys. boxes that say MOVING STUFF are stacked up to the wall. he rushses to the mailbox, looking desperatley through the mail.

he takes out a manilla folder, and runs to his empty room. he sits in the middle, and takes out the letter. and it reads: "this message is to inform mike charettes parents that he has been expelled from..." mike crumples up the letter, and eats it. "expel that" he says with a sigh

laying on his empty floor, he lazily stares at the plain white ceiling, a fan creaking slowly around and around. "im moving to domino in a week or so, its better that way, now mom wont find out i was expelled." he thought, his eyes following the fans blade for sheer boredom.

"it'll be good to see my friends that are over there, but dueling there is supposed to be heavy competition.... i don't know how i can keep up with them." he said, rubbing his temples. "but i will! everyone will know the Machine Knight's ferocity!" mike said with a yell, thrusting his fist in the air.

"but first, i eat ramen.... and play video games....... and sleep." he said, running to the kitchen
11212.title: mikes dilemma

choices: be challenged to a duel by a strange robed figure
112121.content:
(okay, as a reminder, mike lived in a different town, and moved to domino. they own a townhouse right now, and have just moved into it. sorry for the confusion)

"ahh.... domino.... big city." mike said, hopping out of the moving truck to stretch his legs. "now we live here mike, instead of 3 miles away. be sure to say hi some of your old friends!" his mom said, hefting a box of stuff into the house. mike smiled, and ran off with his deck.

he was just trying to take all this in. he was going to domino high school now, which somehow didnt get a letter to say he was expelled, and thats a good sign. "cant wait to see everyone. yugi will be amazed i live in the city now." he exclaimed through his gasps while running. he reached the school. prestine, elegant.... empowering. "perfect" mike said, his fist tightening, and enetered the doors. they wouldnt open.

"oh yeah... its saturday..... nevermind." mike said, checking to see if anyone saw him. after that, he was at a loss of wwhat top do next.....
112121.title: moving day

113.content:
You come home from school one day to find a strange man waiting at your door. He says nothing; only handing you an envelope before he walks off. You look back to try to identify the man, but he is gone. You shrug and walk inside. Once inside, you notice that it is strangely quiet. That's weird. Your dad and your brother are usually home before now. A quick search tells you that neither of them are there. Now feeling really confused, you sit down and open the envelope. Inside is a single Duel Monsters card and a piece of paper. "WHOA!!" you exclaim. It turns out that the card is a Blue-Eyes White Dragon. "No way!!!" You remember the guy at the card shop telling you that there were only 4 of these in the whole world. This will be the PERFECT addition to your light deck! Then you decide to read what's on the paper. Nothing could have prepared you for what was written there. You read in shock:

Dear Duelist:
We have your family. We will only release them on one condition. That is, you come to the KC arena tonight at midnight and bring your dueling deck. We think that with the enclosed card, you just might stand a chance against our champion. Please, come alone.

You look at your watch. It's only four P.M. Plenty of time to plan. So what do you do?
113.title: The Gauntlet is Thrown

choices: run off to Kiaba Corp and prepare your deck til midnight
prepare deck then go to Kiaba Corp at midnight
11321.content:
"Hey, Yugi I may need your help my dad and brother are not here" you said.
"hey slow down what is wrong with your dad and brother being home" Yugi said.
"Het I just remembered something" you said.
"Yeah what?" Yugi said.
"Doesn't your Grampa normally answer the phone instead of you where is he" you said.
"I don't know be right back" Yugi said. A few minutes later "I can't find him anywhere"
"Look outside see if you see anybody" you said.
"ok" Yugi said. when Yugi opens the door still holding the phone someone gives him an envolope and runs off "um ok" Yugi said and closed the door.
"what is it someone at your door"
"yeah how did you know"
"same thing happened i got a Blue Eyes White Dragon in it and where to got to get my dad and brother back Kaiba Corp. at midnight bet it is the same thing for you"
"Yeah your right but i got a different card"
"yeah what"
"well it is more than one check yours again i got Obolisk the Tormentor, Slifer The Sky Dragon and The Winged Dragon of Ra"
"WHAT!?!?!??!!!!!!!!!!!!!"
"check your envolope"
"oh wait i do have more"
"so do i it seems"
"oh great i can't win against you"
"what i got really fits you Blue Eyes Shining Dragon it is better then Blue Eyes White Dragon"
"WHAT!?!?!?!?!"
"um hello you still there i guess i will meet you infront of Kiaba Corp at midnight"
great what am i going to do if i have to duel Yugi those cards he got how can i win
11321.title: Yugi Muto

115.content: You have a good dragon deck And you even have 3 B.E.W.D.And when you get home after school there is a package waiting for you it has a guantlet with two star chips and an invitation to a duel monsters tournament inside. Will you

1151.title: Duelist Kingdom

115111.title: It's Time To Duel

1151111.content:
You stare your hand over. "I'll start by summoning Spear Dragon in attack mode, along with one card facedown!" A purple and beige-colored dragon appear, a long snout sprouting from its face. The Spell/Trap zone behind the monster glows, signaling it's in use. Your opponent draws.

"I'll activate..."
1151111.title: First Duel

11511111.content: "By using pot of greed I get to draw 2 cards". Then your OPPONITE summons Hitch Hopper. "I now activate dark hole which takes out all monsters on the field, and when Hitch Hopper goes to the grave yard I can summon any monster from my hand", said Willis. A black hole appears in the middle of the field and takes out Spear Dragon and Hitch Hopper. Then Willis summons Mermaid Knight in defense mode. What does he play next?
11511111.title: Pot of Greed

Solemn Judgement, I will pay half of my Life Points

"I'II activate Dark Hole!! with Dark Hole I can destroy all the monsters on the field" Your Opponent said think he did his move perfectly.

"No so fast I activate..."

12431222.content:
My name is Caleb....Caleb Hopper to exact. I'm a duelist with high dueling skill. I use a lyoko deck that is based around Lyoko Warriors and XANA type monsters. I accept any challenge that is thrown at me. I always draw the right cards to win my duels and no....I don't cheat. I get lucky with my draws. So. Let's see if I could find good opponents to face.


I was walking around duelist kindom for an opponent to face. I already had 7 star chips but I couldn't find no one until one person named Joey wheeler came up and challenged me to a duel to which I accepted.

Me: I won't lose to a beginner like yourself.

Joey: That's it. Your asking for trouble.

Both: Let's duel!

Me: I'll start off. *as I drew my card* Perfect. I summon "Hornet (X.A.N.A)" in defence mode. When he is summon or special summoned then you take 1000 points of damage.

Yugi: I've never seen him use this deck before.

Joey: Say WHAT?!

Joey's LP 1000

Me: I end my turn with three facedowns. Your up Joey.

PS. Email me since I know this deck incase you are wondering about what a lyoko deck is. Silverfighter, please don't delete this chapter because people may add to this.
12431222.title: Caleb goes global dueling

choices: Go to gramps' shop, see if you can get some new cards
125.content:
Your name is Jen and you are a duelest at Yugi's high school. In fact, he is one of your good friends. Right now, you are facing Joey in a duel and are about to lose...

Joey: 3000
Jen: 500

"Ok, my move," you say drawing your card.
"Oh come on and give up all ready," says Joey, "You know you can't win. And thanks to your Skull Invitation trap card, if one of your cards is sent to the graveyard, you will take 300 points of dammage." "Ya, but same goes for you, that is why I am going to win this duel," you say. "Now, since you destroyed my Double Coston, I can use Call of the Mummy to special summon one zombie from my hand now that I have no monsters on my side of the feild, and all you have is your Red Eyes Black Dragon." "Ya, and your point is? You still cant summon a monster powerfull enough to beat me." "Not quite... I play my spell card, Hammer Shot to destroy your Red Eyes." "SAY WHAT!"

Joey: 2700
Jen: 200

"Hammer Shot destroys the monster with the higest attack, and that was your Red Eyes... Now I activate the power of my Call of the Mummy to summon Vampire Lord"

Vampire Lord: 2000/1500

"I then remove Vampire Lord from play to special summon the mighty Vampire Genesis."

Vampire Genesis: 3000/2100

"I attack for game."

Joey: 0000
Jen 200

"Great game guys," said Yugi who was watching your duel, "What should we do now?"
125.title: Zombie Deck, chicks use them too

1252.content:
You, Yugi, and the gang went over to Yugi's gramp shop and saw when they entered, Yugi's grandfather was shaking hands with a teen, about Jen's age, with his deck on belt and a duel disk on his wrist.
Adam: Thanks for the tips, Mr. Moto. It was a close duel.
Gramps: No problem, Adam. (Sees Yugi and the gang) Oh hello Yugi. This is a student of mine, Adam Rhodes. (To Adam) This is my grandson....
Adam: The magnificent Yugi Moto, the king of games. And I know his friends, Tea, Joey and Tristan. But I don't know her. (Points at Jen)
Joey: That's Jen.
Adam: Nice to meet you all. (Has a grin on his face)
Tea: Same, Adam
Joey and Tristan: Yea, sure, whatever.
Gramps: Adam and I had a close duel before you entered.
Yugi: Don't tell he beat you.
Adam: Actually, I lost, But it was a close.
Jen: How close?
Adam: Last card in my deck close.
Tea: Woah.
Joey wasn't impressed still and Adam saw it in his eyes.
Adam: How about I show you what your grandfather has taught me?
Yugi: Thats a great idea. Who do you wanna face?
Adam: Well, I would choose you Yugi, but I see Joey thinks I cant handle my own.
Joey: What you saying Wise guy?
Adam: You don't believe I can beat anyone, but Im full of surprises, Joey. What you say, Joey? Cant handle a challenge?
1252.title: A new duelist appears

12521.content:
Joey accepted the duel but didnt know whar he was going against. Adam was a graduate from duel academy and the youngest as well, and his father was and expert. Adam was a mixed deck user, but mostly had his dragons.

The duel was intense, Joey and Adam were tied at 300 lp points each. Adam played a card called Foolish Burial which sent one card from deck to the grave and had a little dragon named Decoy Dragon with a measly 300 atack points on the field while Joey had his Reds Eyes Black Dragon with 2400 attack points. Joey chuckled at the little dragon, but he didnt know its deadly ability when Joey sent his attack with Red eyes black dragon's Black Flame attack. Adam activated it's ablity to summon any dragon in his graveyard to take its place, which he picked the card that he just sent to the grave, Tyrant Dragon, with 2900 attack points to destroy Red eyes and win the duel. Adam got up and put out his to be a good sport.
Adam: That was a good duel, Joey.
12521.title: He accepts the challenge

info.brief_description: You're one of the dueling heroes!
info.description: You live in Domino City, and a new fad called Duel Monsters just got big in your school. You and your best friend, Yugi Mutoh, are the two strongest duelists around. But little did you know...your journey is about to begin...
